statements: SELECT * FROM RentalProperties ORDER BY rental_price DESC;
SELECT property_name, rental_price FROM RentalProperties WHERE rental_price > 1000;
SELECT property_name, property_type FROM RentalProperties WHERE property_rating > 4.5;
SELECT property_name, property_type, rental_duration FROM RentalProperties WHERE rental_duration = 'Monthly';
SELECT property_name, property_location.ST_X() AS latitude, property_location.ST_Y() AS longitude FROM RentalProperties;
SELECT * FROM RentalProperties WHERE rental_price > 1000 ORDER BY property_rating DESC;
SELECT property_name, property_type, rental_price FROM RentalProperties WHERE rental_duration = 'Long-term' ORDER BY property_location;
SELECT DISTINCT property_type FROM RentalProperties WHERE property_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT AVG(rental_price) AS avg_rental_price, MAX(rental_price) AS max_rental_price FROM RentalProperties WHERE property_type = 'Apartment';
SELECT property_name, ST_AsText(property_location) AS location FROM RentalProperties WHERE ST_Equals(property_location, ST_GeomFromText('POINT(40.7128 -74.0060)'));
SELECT * FROM rental_properties;
SELECT property_name, property_price FROM rental_properties WHERE property_location = 'New York';
SELECT trend_location, trend_date FROM rental_trends ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(property_price) AS max_price FROM rental_properties;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_properties FROM rental_properties WHERE property_location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM rental_properties;
SELECT property_name, property_price FROM rental_properties WHERE property_price > 1000;
SELECT property_name, property_location.STAsText() AS location FROM rental_properties WHERE property_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT property_name, property_price FROM rental_properties ORDER BY property_price DESC;
SELECT trend_date, trend_location.STAsText() AS location, trend_description FROM rental_trends WHERE trend_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM rental_properties;
SELECT property_name, rental_price FROM rental_properties ORDER BY rental_price DESC;
SELECT property_name, location FROM rental_properties WHERE rental_price > 1000;
SELECT * FROM rental_trends WHERE rental_date > '2022-01-01' AND occupancy_rate < 90;
SELECT hotspot_location, average_rent FROM rental_hotspots ORDER BY average_rent DESC;
SELECT * FROM rental_properties ORDER BY property_name ASC;
SELECT property_name, rental_price FROM rental_properties WHERE rental_price > 1000;
SELECT property_name, ST_AsText(location) AS location FROM rental_properties WHERE ST_Y(location) < 45.0;
SELECT * FROM rental_trends WHERE rental_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY occupancy_rate DESC;
SELECT r.property_name, h.average_rent FROM rental_properties r INNER JOIN rental_hotspots h ON r.property_id = h.hotspot_id;
SELECT * FROM RentalProperties;
SELECT property_name, location, rental_price FROM RentalProperties WHERE property_type = 'Apartment';
SELECT property_name, rental_price FROM RentalProperties ORDER BY rental_price DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM RentalLocations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -70;
SELECT user_name, email FROM RentalUsers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM RentalProperties WHERE rental_price > 2000 ORDER BY property_name LIMIT 5;
SELECT property_id, property_name, rental_price FROM RentalProperties WHERE property_type = 'Apartment' ORDER BY rental_price DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM RentalLocations WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -100 ORDER BY location_name;
SELECT rt.trend_date, rp.property_name, rt.average_rental_price FROM RentalTrends rt JOIN RentalProperties rp ON rt.property_id = rp.property_id WHERE rt.hotspot = TRUE ORDER BY rt.trend_date DESC;

SELECT ru.user_name, ru.email, rp.property_name, rp.rental_price FROM RentalUsers ru JOIN RentalProperties rp ON ru.user_id = rp.property_id WHERE ru.phone_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY ru.user_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM rental_properties;
SELECT property_name, city, state FROM rental_properties;
SELECT property_id, address, zipcode FROM rental_properties ORDER BY zipcode DESC;
SELECT feature_name, property_name FROM rental_features JOIN rental_properties ON rental_features.property_id = rental_properties.property_id;
SELECT * FROM rental_ratings WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM rental_properties;
SELECT property_name, city, state FROM rental_properties WHERE state='California';
SELECT property_name, address, zipcode FROM rental_properties WHERE city='Los Angeles' AND state='California';
SELECT * FROM rental_features WHERE feature_name LIKE '%pool%';
SELECT property_name, rating, review FROM rental_properties JOIN rental_ratings ON rental_properties.property_id = rental_ratings.property_id;
